thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 17 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sphere 3D Corp Files Supplement To Definitive Proxy Statement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sphere 3D Corp Files Supplement To Definitive Proxy Statement
text:
May 17 (Reuters) - Sphere 3D Corp:
* SPHERE 3D CORP - FILES SUPPLEMENT TO DEFINITIVE PROXY STATEMENT
* SPHERE 3D CORP - SUPPLEMENT IS INTENDED TO DISCLOSE THAT PURCHASER AND SPHERE 3D MAY POTENTIALLY AMEND AGREEMENT RELATING TO SHARE PURCHASE
* SPHERE 3D CORP - AS OF DATE HEREOF, AGREEMENT RELATING TO SHARE PURCHASE HAS NOT BEEN AMENDED TO EFFECT POTENTIAL CHANGE IN CONSIDERATION OR OTHERWISE
* SPHERE 3D - MAY POTENTIALLY AMEND AGREEMENT TO PROVIDE THAT PURCHASER COULD ASSUME SOME OF COâ€™S DEBT OBLIGATIONS INSTEAD OF PAYING FULL PRICE IN CASH
* SPHERE 3D CORP - SPECIAL COMMITTEE, BOARD CONCLUDED POTENTIAL CONSIDERATION CHANGE WOULD NOT SUBSTANTIVELY ALTER CURRENT TERMS OF SHARE PURCHASE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
